content.new: Hello! My OS is ubuntu 12.04 32bit. I use gazebo (version: 1.9.1-1) through gazebo_ros package (version: 2.3.0-0precise-20130820-1229-+0000) in ros hydro. Today I upgraded the sdformat package, and the gazebo crashes when spawning an urdf model into a si

issue.title: Gazebo crashes when spawning model after upgrading sdformat from 1.4.6-1 to 1.4.7-1
